Package controller

Class AddPartController

java.lang.Object
controller.AddPartController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddPartController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is used to implement controller for the AddPart form.

  • Method Details

    • cancelAction

      void cancelAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is used to exit the AddPart form and return to the Main form. It will erase existing field texts if it's confirmed.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • inHToggled

      void inHToggled(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is used to set the Machine ID when the InHouse radio button is toggled.

    • outSToggled

      void outSToggled(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is used to set the Company Name when the OutSourced radio button is toggled.

    • saveAction

      void saveAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is used to save field text entries and create a new Part object.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • mainMenu

      private void mainMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is used to create action event so other methods can return to the Main form.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • validMin

      private boolean validMin(int min, int max)
      This method is used to create alert error if the minimum value entered is not valid.

    • validInv

      private boolean validInv(int min, int max, int stock)
      This method is used to create alert error if the inventory value entered is not valid.
